scenes.background: Monica nods, still concerned. Bob looks at his notes.
scenes.description: Bob says, 'We really should take a bit more time to ensure we get this right.'

options.text: I understand, Bob. Let's allocate five more minutes to finalize.
options.analysis: You acknowledge Bob's need for thoroughness and propose a short extension, showing empathy and self-regulation.

options.text: Monica, any chance you can give us a few more minutes to wrap up?
options.analysis: You address Monica's urgency directly, showing good perception and motivation to ensure everyone's concerns are met.

options.text: If we delay any longer, we'll miss the deadline. Let's make a quick decision.
options.analysis: You emphasize the importance of deadlines and urge a swift decision, demonstrating social skill and motivation to move forward.
